coreAttributes.name: victims letter (harpy)
coreAttributes.description: it's a letter you found on a harpy snapper

useDescriptions.selfUse:
[npc.she] desides to look at the letter, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the letter from the slerm to [npc.her] eyes and started to read it.
Dear client,
I’m please to inform you that your application has been accepted, as such you are now a marked down in my personal records as a test subject of one of my latest products. You specified in your application that your motivations are to “To be a better flyer” as said in your letter to me, it took me some time to think what product might help you. Within this package you should find the product that should assist you with this hopefully it gives the bite you so desire. Regarding the protection money you forgot to pay, I’ll tell my people to leave your business be, as long as you consume the product within three days. I also want to remind you that any mention of my program to anyone who is not part of my program is strictly prohibited, and if this agreement is broken your body will be claimed as collateral and used to further my research into the genetic material I have obtained for Merra.
Please enjoy your new body.
Sincerely,
Madam Eris
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.she] [npc.verb(decide)] to show the letter to [npc2.name], but they art intrested in some letter you found on a body.
